EmailTemplate.name: Memorial Day LL
EmailTemplate.subject: Memorial Day information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for volunteering your time to help with IAVA this Memorial Day.
If you havenâ€™t already, please contact your local cemetery to verify the times and dates are correct. Also, please fill out this form<http://iava.org/memorial-day-ceremony-information>; it should only take a couple of minutes.
If you have any questions at all please contact me as soon as possible.
Thanks, Anthony
--
Anthony Pike
Membership Coordinator
Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor
New York, NY 10017
(212) 982-9699
www.iava.org
Follow us on Twitter: @IAVA
